result.execSummary:
The defendant Cristoval Juan Rocha was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Straight Time. Sentence credit of 23 days were granted. TIME SERVED.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Hearing returned, for hearing scheduled on: November 24, 2014 Plea/Sentencing Hearing.  Defendant no longer resides in the Waukesha County Jail.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Cristoval Juan Rocha in court, in custody, with attorney Benjamin J Peirce.   Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 2.  Court finds defendant guilty. Ct. 1 dismissed and read-in. 

Court orders the following:
Ct. 2:
-  23 days jail with credit for 23 days - time served
- Court orders all costs waived
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 24, 2014 at 10:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 20, 2014 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Cristoval Juan Rocha in court, in custody, with attorney J Anthony Rosario.   Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed.   Defendant would like to accept for the state's offer and matter will be a waiver in Br. 9.  Time limits are tolled.   Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 20, 2014 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Cristoval Juan Rocha
Current: 515 West Moreland Blvd, c/o Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States  (Effective: 11-04-2014)
Prior: 601 Main Street, Mukwonago, WI 53149

Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness or her residence listed in the Criminal Complaint.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.

Defendant Cristoval Juan Rocha in court, in custody, with attorney Kelsey Morin.   Attorney appears as friend of the court.  Timothy F. Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court tolled time limits for preliminary hearing for the status of counsel.  Hearing scheduled for November 6, 2014 at 01:15 pm.
